author: minfrin
msg: mod_authn_dbd: Export any additional columns queried in the SQL select
into the environment with the name AUTHENTICATE_<COLUMN>. This brings
mod_authn_dbd behaviour in line with mod_authnz_ldap.

msg: Added properties to ensure that we compile for Java 1.4

msg: Fixed tests on Linux (mostly due to different socket implementation)
Implemented case-insensitive file system as requested on the mailing list

msg: Added the most commonly used content decoders and accompanying test cases
